Thanks for your suggestion but it's really hard for me right now to do that. There's no need to install a app/game to find out what that is. Just tap on that and it will show the name of the software you are going to install. Continue if you are interested or just hit the cancel button if you don't. I actually keep the file intact so that the md5 checksum stays same. It's states that the file isn't modified or repacked to add any deceptive codes. Sorry for the little convenience for better privacy. I prioritize that matter the most.

This is a big torrent to download when you've no idea - at all,  what's on it :-)
